model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to hold information about the game in progress.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        board - The board of player1

        playerShips - Ship placement positions of player1

        board2 - The board of player2
        player2Ships - Ship placement positions of player2
